<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a root node that connects to every connected component of the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is done to allow graph iterators to visit all the disjoint components</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the graph, in a single walk.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This algorithm works by going through each node of the graph and for each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node N, do a DFS starting from N. A rooted edge is established between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// root node and N (if N is not yet visited). All the nodes reachable from N</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are marked as visited and are skipped in the DFS of subsequent nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a022f8d18fe9e9e880c51db47e2f372db"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: This algorithm tries to limit the number of edges out of the root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node to some extent, but there may be redundant edges created depending on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the iteration order. For example for a graph &#123;A -&gt; B&#125;, an edge from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// root node is added to both nodes if B is visited before A. While it does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a56732d193d3946d953c77a80e07ef61a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not result in minimal number of edges, this approach saves compile-time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while keeping the number of edges in check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;RootNode = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a6d0ad7c2f9c9bd805cf19a4b8936e6ae">createRootNode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/df-iterator-default-set">df&#95;iterator&#95;default&#95;set&lt;const NodeType &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Visited;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#ac76acbd497d18c7306f8120c6f11fb51"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#adfe1af074dc71e900744bf6e4fbe3356">Graph</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == RootNode)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a029feb493f45bc96d5369e201fd84e0c">depth&#95;first&#95;ext</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, Visited))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a9c4196edca24d644ff96e55945abd207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a550d05205fe4e217c45862cd0455386e">createRootedEdge</a>(RootNode, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a008891a00a9aec8710d95ec82fd72196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> G&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a">AbstractDependenceGraphBuilder&lt;G&gt;::createPiBlocks</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a0efe68c840fb839433af923abcf4f98a">shouldCreatePiBlocks</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;==== Start of Creation of Pi-Blocks ===\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#afba90b653098f15528a273ced632683a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The overall algorithm is as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Identify SCCs and for each SCC create a pi-block node containing all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the nodes in that SCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Identify incoming edges incident to the nodes inside of the SCC and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    reconnect them to the pi-block node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 Identify outgoing edges from the nodes inside of the SCC to nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    outside of it and reconnect them so that the edges are coming out of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    SCC node instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa58986a6df89ded5c86fc981ad2bf53c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adding nodes as we iterate through the SCCs cause the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterators to get invalidated. To prevent this invalidation, we first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// collect a list of nodes that are part of an SCC, and then iterate over</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#a2ca7af382aa1a34576aee355f364447c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// those lists to create the pi-block nodes. Each element of the list is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// list of nodes in an SCC. Note: trivial SCCs containing a single node are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;NodeListType, 4&gt;</a> ListOfSCCs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SCC : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3c1a67796e24a843db8a6766baa54c21">scc&#95;begin</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#adfe1af074dc71e900744bf6e4fbe3356">Graph</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab538c5d036c618405f9bffe1b3a6955f">scc&#95;end</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#adfe1af074dc71e900744bf6e4fbe3356">Graph</a>))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SCC.size() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ListOfSCCs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(SCC.begin(), SCC.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeListType &amp;NL : ListOfSCCs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Creating pi-block node with &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; NL.size()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; nodes in it.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SCC iterator may put the nodes in an order that&#39;s different from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// program order. To preserve original program order, we sort the list of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes based on ordinal numbers computed earlier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(NL, &#91;&amp;&#93;(NodeType &#42;LHS, NodeType &#42;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getOrdinal(&#42;LHS) &lt; getOrdinal(&#42;RHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NodeType &amp;PiNode = createPiBlock(NL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++TotalPiBlockNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Build a set to speed up the lookup for edges whose targets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are inside the SCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;NodeType &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NodesInSCC(NL.begin(), NL.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have the set of nodes in the SCC. We go through the set of nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that are outside of the SCC and look for edges that cross the two sets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Graph) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip the SCC node and all the nodes inside of it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == PiNode || NodesInSCC.count(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#ab4c7e3039b29b12e4dc97bcae93d79c3">Direction</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/incoming">Incoming</a>,      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Incoming edges to the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Outgoing,      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edges going ot of the SCC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DirectionCount </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make the enum usable as an array index.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use these flags to help us avoid creating redundant edges. If there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are more than one edges from an outside node to inside nodes, we only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// keep one edge from that node to the pi-block node. Similarly, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there are more than one edges from inside nodes to an outside node,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we only keep one edge from the pi-block node to the outside node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a flag defined for each direction (incoming vs outgoing) and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for each type of edge supported, using a two-dimensional boolean</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">EdgeKind = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeType::EdgeKind;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/enumeratedarray">EnumeratedArray&lt;bool, EdgeKind&gt;</a> EdgeAlreadyCreated&#91;DirectionCount&#93;&#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createEdgeOfKind = &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">NodeType</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">NodeType</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeKind K) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (K) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeKind::RegisterDefUse:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">          createDefUseEdge(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeKind::MemoryDependence:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">          createMemoryEdge(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EdgeKind::Rooted:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">          createRootedEdge(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have a dependence with its left-most non-&#39;=&#39; direction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being &#39;&gt;&#39; we need to reverse the direction of the edge, because</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid creating duplicate edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ForwardEdgeCreated &amp;&amp; BackwardEdgeCreated)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;ve created edges in both directions, there is no more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unique edge that we can create between these two nodes, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can exit early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ForwardEdgeCreated &amp;&amp; BackwardEdgeCreated)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa58986a6df89ded5c86fc981ad2bf53c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> G&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa58986a6df89ded5c86fc981ad2bf53c">AbstractDependenceGraphBuilder&lt;G&gt;::simplify</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;==== Start of Graph Simplification ===\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This algorithm works by first collecting a set of candidate nodes that have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an out-degree of one (in terms of def-use edges), and then ignoring those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whose targets have an in-degree more than one. Each node in the resulting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set can then be merged with its corresponding target and put back into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worklist until no further merge candidates are available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;NodeType &#42;, 32&gt;</a> CandidateSourceNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A mapping between nodes and their in-degree. To save space, this map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only contains nodes that are targets of nodes in the CandidateSourceNodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;NodeType &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> TargetInDegreeMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NodeType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#adfe1af074dc71e900744bf6e4fbe3356">Graph</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getEdges().size() != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EdgeType &amp;Edge = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Edge.isDefUse())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CandidateSourceNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert an element into the in-degree map and initialize to zero. The</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not merge if there is also an edge from target to src (immediate</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Tgt.hasEdgeTo(Src))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/abstractdependencegraphbuilder/#aa203d4dd4a4b21ce9f1769684ead617a">mergeNodes</a>(Src, Tgt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target node is in the candidate set itself, we need to put the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// src node back into the worklist again so it gives the target a chance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to get merged into it. For example if we have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;(a)-&gt;(b), (b)-&gt;(c), (c)-&gt;(d), ...&#125; and the worklist is initially &#123;b, a&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then after merging (a) and (b) together, we need to put (a,b) back in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the worklist so that (c) can get merged in as well resulting in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;(a,b,c) -&gt; d&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We also need to remove the old target (b), from the worklist. We first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove it from the candidate set here, and skip any item from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worklist that is not in the set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CandidateSourceNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a11045c7973ab24a8d6315b61fa337d4e">erase</a>(&amp;Tgt)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Worklist.push&#95;back(&amp;Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CandidateSourceNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(&amp;Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Putting &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &amp;Src &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; back in the worklist.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=== End of Graph Simplification ===\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
